She has one employee to assist her in the business which is located in a very competitive environment. She also runs a salon to increase her earnings.  Previously, Regina was running a grocery store before she ventured into these businesses.  She is requesting Kes.80,000 to add stock in her shop, and she dreams of buying a farm in the future.

texts.es:
Maritza tiene 35 años, es una madre de familia muy amorosa y trabajadora, vive en dos cuartos alquilados junto a su esposo Alex de 29 años y sus 3 menores hijos; lo que más desea es mejorar su calidad de vida.

Su puesto de comida es el más concurrido del mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma, todos los días sus clientes se dan cita en su puesto para degustar los deliciosos menús que prepara. Ella es una cocinera muy hábil y es que desde muy pequeña le nació el amor por la cocina y ahora se siente muy feliz realizando este trabajo.
Lleva 10 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es atender a todas las personas que entran a su restaurante, ya que muchas veces tiene que trabajar sola. Con el paso de los meses, espera mejorar la infraestructura de su puesto y así tener más clientes.

Es el sexto préstamo de Maritza con MFP, espera ser muy puntual en el pago de sus cuotas, ya que desea acceder a más créditos. Ella es parte de un banco comunal, donde participa activamente. Con los mil quinientos nuevos soles solicitados comprará nuevas ollas y utensilios, ya que los que usaba se han deteriorado con el paso del tiempo.
texts.en:
Maritza is 35 years old. She is a loving mother and hard-working. She lives with her 29-year old husband Alex and their three children in two rented rooms. She dreams of improving their quality of life. Her food stand is the busiest in the market in the city of Tarma. Every day her customers make plans to enjoy the delicious food she prepares. She is a great cook and has loved to cook since she was a child. She feels very content with her job. She has been working as a cook for ten years and her biggest challenges is serving all her clients because a lot of the time she works alone. In the coming months, she hopes to improve her locale and attract more customers. This is the sixth loan Maritza has had with MFP. She plans to be punctual with her payments because she hopes to apply for future loans. She is part of a community bank, of which she is an active participant. With the 1,500 new soles from this loan she will buy new pots and cooking utensils because her current utensils have gone through a lot of wear and tear.

Translated from Spanish by Patrick King, Kiva Volunteer

loans.name: Yobani Francisco

texts.es:
El señor Yobani Francisco G., labora para la empresa Camiones y Motores desde hace un año y ocho meses, desempeñandose como Guardespalda, don Yovani necesita el credito para la compra de materiales ya que quiere realizarle mejoras a su Vivienda, como ser ampliacion de la cocina e instalar ceramica, construccion de una habitacion y un muro en la parte frontal de su vivienda. Es viudo, su esposa murio hace unos años, y tiene un hijo el cual esta a cargo de el. con su salario mensual cubre con el pago del credito.
su meta es poder terminar de construir su casa de habitacion y asi poder darle una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo que es lo que mas quiere en este mundo.
texts.en:
Mr. Yobani Francisco G. has worked as a security guard for the Trucks and Motors company for a year and eight months. Yovani needs a loan to purchase materials to make improvements on his house. He wants to add on to the kitchen, tile the floor, build an extra room, and put a wall up in front of his house. He is a widower. His wife died a few years ago. He has one son who lives with him. He will use his monthly salary to make his loan payments. His goal is to finish building his house and thus improve his son's quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Patrick King, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of sand, iron bars, cement block, and tiles

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Veronicah

texts.en: Veronicah is a 45-year-old lady, widowed and blessed with four children.  She has a fruits and vegetables stall where she sells fruits, vegetables and cereals. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to take out six loans worth Kes 260,000. She hopes to start a wholesale shop and improve her living standards in the future. She has requested a loan of Kes 50,000 from Faulu Kenya to add to her stock of cereals, fruits and other consumer goods.  She describes herself as a confident and determined lady.

loans.use: To buy cereals, fruits and consumer goods

texts.es:
Mauro tiene 31 años, desde muy joven ha realizado distintos trabajos con el único afán de mejorar su calidad de vida. Ahora vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Marlene de 34 años, quien trabaja atendiendo en una farmacia, y con su querido hijo Alejandro de 1 año, a quienes desea brindar un mejor futuro.

Su negocio es la venta de computadoras y accesorios, con el amplio conocimiento que tiene en computación ha logrado sacar adelante su negocio, ya que los equipos que vende son de muy buena calidad. Él trae las computadoras desde la ciudad de Lima, motivo por el cual puede ofrecerlas a menor costo.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es aconsejar a sus clientes y recomendarles los accesorios que mejor les servirán. Lleva 3 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es conseguir partes para computadoras de buena calidad. 
Con el tiempo, espera que su negocio crezca y que le pueda brindar mejores ingresos económicos.

Este es el tercer préstamo de Mauro con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente si quiere acceder a otro préstamo en el futuro. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados comprará nuevos accesorios, ya que desea implementar mejor su tienda.
texts.en:
Mauro is 31 years old and since he was young, has worked in various jobs with his only desire being to improve his quality of life. Now he lives in his own house with his wife Marlene, who is 34 years old and works as a pharmacy attendant, and with their son Alejandro who is 1 and who they hope to give a better future. Mauro's business is selling computers and accessories. With the vast knowledge he has in computation and because the machines he sells are very good quality he has succeeded in moving his business forward. He brings the computers from the city of Lima, motivated by the fact that he can offer them at a lower price. What he likes most about his job is advising his customers and recommending to them the accessories that will serve them best. It has taken 3 years to build this business and what he thinks is most difficult about the job is finding computer parts that are good quality. With time he hopes that his business will grow and that he will be able to make a better income. This is the third loan Mauro has had with MFP, and he knows that he must make all of his payments on time if he wants to get another loan in the future. With the two thousand nuevos soles he is requesting he will buy new accessories which he wants to better equip his stall.

Translated from Spanish by Alison Fanning, Kiva Volunteer

texts.es:
Nilder tiene 22 años, es un joven muy alegre y trabajador. Vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Nelcy de 22 años y su querido hijo Cristian de 5 años, quienes son el principal motivo de todos sus esfuerzos.

En el poblado de “San Juan de la Libertad” se encuentran las chacras de Nilder. Desde muy joven aprendió la agricultura de sus padres y ahora el tiene sus propias tierras, las cuales con ayuda de su esposa cultiva y trabaja diariamente. Sus productos los lleva a vender al mercado mayorista de la ciudad y debido a la buena calidad de éstos siempre recibe un muy buen pago.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus sembríos de las plagas que pueden afectarlas; lleva 6 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus cultivos hasta el mercado mayorista. 
Para el futuro de su negocio, espera juntar el dinero necesario para tener su propio puesto de venta, en el cual pueda trabajar su esposa, ya que actualmente vende sus productos de forma ambulante.

Este es el primer préstamo de Nilder con MFP y siente que este crédito le ayudará mucho en el desarrollo de su actividad. En su banco comunal es un socio muy responsable, de lo cual se siente muy orgulloso. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados comprará semillas de alverja para incrementar la producción de este producto, ya que está teniendo gran demanda en el mercado.
texts.en:
Nilder, age 22, is a very happy and hard-working young man. He lives in his own house with his 22 year old wife, Nelcy, and their beloved five year old son, Cristian. They are the primary motive for all of his efforts. Nilder’s fields are in the San Juan de la Libertad village. He learned about farming from his parents when he was very young. Now he has his own land. With help from his wife, he cultivates and works on the land everyday. He takes his products to sell at the wholesale market in the city. He is always paid very well because of the good quality of his crops. What he likes best about his work is taking care of his crops so that they are not affected by pests. He has been doing this activity for six years. The most difficult part is transporting his crops to the wholesale market. For the future of his business he hopes to get together enough money to have his own sales stand. He could work there with his wife. She currently sells their products as a traveling vendor. This is Nilder’s first loan with MFP. He feels that this loan will help him a lot to develop his business. He is a very responsible member of his communal bank, and he is very proud of that. He will use the 1,000 PEN that he has requested to buy pea seeds to increase his production of this product. There is currently a great demand in the market.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

texts.es:
Pedro tiene 46 años, es un padre de familia muy alegre y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Ceferina de 45 años, quien lo apoya en la chacra y lo que más desea es mejorar su calidad de vida.

Se dedica a la siembra de papa, choclo, zanahorias, maíz y alverjas, los cuales después de cosecharlos vende en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma, donde ya tiene varios clientes que sabiendo de la calidad de su producto no dudan en esperarlo para comprarle todo al por mayor.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras y hacerlas fértiles y productivas; lleva 30 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es fumigar sus chacras, ya que tiene que hacerlo con mucho cuidado, puesto que no quiere que los químicos le causen una enfermedad. En adelante, espera seguir vendiendo sus productos, pero para mejorar sus ganancias desea comprarse un auto con el cual él mismo pueda transportar sus cultivos.

Este es el octavo préstamo de Pedro con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar sus cuotas puntualmente si desea acceder a otro crédito en el futuro. En su banco comunal es un socio muy responsable y preocupado por el bienestar de todos sus compañeros. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados comprará insecticidas, ya que tiene que fumigar sus siembras.
texts.en:
Pedro is 46 years old and a father. He is very happy and a worker. He lives in his own house with his wife Ceferina who is 45 years old and helps him on the farm. What they want most is to have a better quality of life. He works planting potatoes, sweet corn, carrots, corn and peas, which after harvesting he sells in the oldest market in the city of Tarma where he already has several customers who know the quality of his product and don't hesitate to wait to buy them in bulk. What he likes most about his job is planting his land and making it fertile and productive. He has been in the business for 30 years and considers the most difficult part to be fumigating his farm, which he has to do very carefully since he doesn't want the chemicals to cause a disease. In the future he hopes to continue selling his products but to increase his income he wants to buy a car which he can use to transport his products. This is the eighth loan Pedro has had with MFP and he knows that he must make his payments on time if he wants to continue getting loans in the future. He is a responsible member of his communal bank and is concerned with the well-being of his friends. With the thousand nuevos soles he is requesting he will buy insecticides to fumigate his crops.

Translated from Spanish by Alison Fanning, Kiva Volunteer

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
Victoria tiene 41 años, es una madre de familia que ha trabajado mucho por sobresalir en su vida. Vive en su casa propia junto a sus 2 menores hijos, su esposo trabaja en la plata eléctrica de la ciudad y desde allí la apoya mandándole dinero mensualmente.

Los cultivos de Victoria son de los mejores del poblado de “Patay”; sus papas, lechugas, alverjas y zanahorias son de muy buena calidad, ya que ella se ha encargado de abonar muy bien sus chacras.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es la época de la cosecha, ya que siente que los meses de arduo trabajo son recompensados. Lleva 25 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es cuidar sus cultivos de las plagas. Con el tiempo, planea comprar un puesto en el mercado mayorista, con el cual desea mejorar sus ingresos económicos.

Este es el décimo préstamo de Victoria con MFP, siempre ha sido muy puntual en el pago de sus cuotas, ya que siente que tiene un compromiso con la institución. A su vez, en su banco comunal es una socia muy comprometida con el desarrollo de su grupo. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados comprará abono para sus chacras, también semillas de alverja y gladiolos (flores).
texts.en:
Victoria is 41 years old and a mother who has worked a great deal to get ahead in life. She lives in her own house with 2 minor children. Her husband works in the city electric plant and from there, helps her by sending money each month. Victoria's crops are among the best in the town of Patey; her potatoes, lettuce, common vetch, and carrots are of very good quality, because she has taken the trouble to spread manure very thoroughly on her farms. What she likes best about her work is harvest season, when she feels compensated for all those months of arduous labor. She's been doing this for 25 years and the most difficult aspect of caring for her crops is diseases. In time, she plans to buy a post in the wholesale market, in hope of advancing her economic wellbeing. This is Victoria's 10th loan with MFP. She has always been very punctual in making payments because she feels an obligation towards the institution. And in turn, in her communal bank she is a member who is very committed to the group's development. With the 2,000 New Sols she is soliciting she will buy manure for her farms, plus seeds for vetch and gladiolas (flowers).

Translated from Spanish by Harold Sims, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: BUYING SEEDS AND MANURE FOR HER FARM

loans.name: Flor De Durazno Group

texts.es:
ESTE GRUPO SE LLAMA FLOR DE DURAZNO  PORQUE  EN LA CASA DONDE SE REUNEN HAY UN ARBOL QUE EN DETERMINADA EPOCA DEL AÑO DAN UNAS FLORES MUY LLAMATIVAS EN FORMA DE RACIMOS COLOR ROSA.

EL GRUPO FLOR DE DURAZNO ESTA UBICADO EN LA COMUNIDAD DE TOTOLAPAN MORELOS MEXICO AL NORTE DEL ESTADO DE MORELOS, CUYO HISTORIAL CREDITICIO SIEMPRE LOS HA DISTINGUIDO POR SER RESPONSABLES EN LOS PAGOS.

LA  SRA. ADRIANA DULCE MARIA L. Z. QUIEN ES ORIGINARIA DE TOTOLAPAN TIENE UNA TIENDA DE ABARROTES, SU FAMILIA ESTA CONFORMADA POR CINCO INTEGRANTES LOS CUALES SON SUS TRES HIJOS (VARONES), SU ESPOSO Y ELLA; SUS TRES HIJOS ESTUDIAN, SU ESPOSO SE LLAMA EDUARDO Y TRABAJA EN EL CAMPO.

ELLA DICE SENTIR UN GRAN APOYO CON LOS CREDITOS QUE SE LE HAN OTORGADO, PUES LE HA AYUDADO A INCREMENTAR SUS VENTAS. EL PROYECTO QUE TIENE CON RESPECTO A SU NEGOCIO ES  QUE  INCREMENTANDO SUS VENTAS PARA QUE PUEDA  SEGUIR INVIRTIENDO EN SU TIENDA DE ABARROTES Y CON LAS GANANCIAS QUE ESTO LE GENERE  CONSTRUIR UN RESPALDO FAMILIAR  ECONOMICO PARA ELLA Y SU FAMILIA Y LOGRAR COMPRAR UNA VITRINA PARA SU NEGOCIO.

LAS OTRAS INTEGRANTES DEL GRUPO Y SUS OFICIOS SON:

MIREYA B. C.-VENTA DE NOVEDADES
LETICIA A. R.-VENTA DE ROPA
SUSANA A. R.-VENTA DE ABARRTOTES
LUMINOSA L. M.-VENTA DE REPOSTERIA
HORTENCIA R. B.-VENTA DE REGALOS
ADRIANA DULCE MARIA L. Z.-VENTA DE ABARROTES
LUCIA N. R.-VENTA DE ZAPATOS
SANDRA B. P.-VENTA DE ABARROTES
texts.en:
This group is called "Flor de Durazno" because at the house where they meet there is a tree that, at a certain time of the year, puts out very showy flowers with pink petals. The group "Flor de Durazno" is located in the community of Totolapan Morelos, Mexico, in the north of the state of Morelos. They have always been distinguished for being responsible in paying back their loans. Adriana, who is originally from Totolapan, has a grocery store. Her family is comprised of five members who are her three sons, her husband and her. Her three sons are students. Her husband is called Eduardo and he works in the fields. She says that she has received great support from the loans that she has been awarded because they have helped her to increase her sales. Her business project is to increase her sales so that she can continue investing in her grocery store and, with the income that this generates, she can build economic support for her and her family and be able to buy a display cabinet for her store. The other members of the group and its officers are: MIREYA B. C.- selling novelty items LETICIA A. R. - selling clothes SUSANA A. R. - selling groceries LUMINOSA L. M. - selling confectionary HORTENCIA R. B. - selling gifts ADRIANA DULCE MARIA L. Z. - selling groceries LUCIA N. R. - selling shoes SANDRA B. P. - selling groceries

Translated from Spanish by Alison Hynd, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To continue investing in her grocery store and to buy a display cabinet for her business

texts.es:
el grupo Jehova Jireh esta integrado por tres personas las cuales se caracterizan por ser personas honestas, este grupo esta ubicado en la colonia Eben Ezer en la ciudad de Danli. a continuacion se detalla las diferentes actividades que ellos realizan:
el sr. MANUEL DE JESUS R. C. se dedica al comercio y su actividad principal es la elaboración y venta de dulces, negocio que opera bajo el nombre de “DULCES R.” su especialidad en la elaboración son los dulces de banano.
Don Manuel R., tiene más de cuatro años de dedicarse a este tipo de actividad, su clientela día a día le exige de mas producto y muchas veces el no puede cumplir las necesidades de sus clientes por falta de capital para la compra de materia prima. 
los clientes prefieren sus dulces por el buen sabor, tamaño de producto y por los precios.
Don Manuel, es casado su esposa le ayuda en el negocio ya que la demanda de producto es bastante, y del matrimonio dependen 2 hijos, los cuales de manera directa también colaboran en el negocio.

la sra. ARSENIA A. tiene más de seis años de dedicarse a la elaboración y venta de tortillas de Maíz, actividad que realiza en su casa de habitación.
se ha sabido ganar la clientela, por el buen tamaño con que elabora las tortillas y por la higiene que muestra en el lugar de elaboracion de su producto.
Sus clientes potenciales son los vecinos de la Col. Eben Ezer, y la Col. Bella Vista, ya que ella elabora las tortillas y las va a dejar a una pulpería, otra parte de las ventas las hace en su casa de habitación, y encargos que tiene permanente de sus clientes.
Doña Arsenia, es casada y su esposo es comerciante individual él sale de manera ambulante a vender achinería (variedades) en diferentes comunidades y aldeas del Departamento de El Paraíso.
Del matrimonio dependen (3) tres hijos, los cuales les brindan a un 100% los gastos de alimentación, Educación, y todo lo que necesiten.

la sra. GLORIA MARINA F. ORDOÑEZ tiene (1) un año de dedicarse al comercio y su actividad principal es la elaboración y venta de Donas.
Doña Gloria, elabora las donas en su casa de habitación y se va ha venderlas a  dos fabricas de tabacos que se encuentran muy cerca de donde ella vive, siendo sus clientes potenciales los empleados de la misma.
Doña Gloria, elabora diario 100 donas, de las cuales no le sobra nada y por falta de capital no puede elaborar mas producto y muchos clientes se quedan sin comprar y deleitar de las deliciosas donas que fabrica, además nos comento que los clientes ya no solo le piden donas si no también Osmil y jugos naturales, pero por falta de efectivo no ha podido comprar los termos y hieleras para poder venderle a sus clientes.
Doña Gloria, es madre soltera con (3) tres hijos y recibe una pensión alimentaría de su ex compañero de hogar, la cual no le es suficiente para cubrir todos las necesidades del hogar.- y fue así como ella tomo la dedición de emprender el negocio en el cual le ha ido muy bien y ahora lo que necesita es capital para abastecer la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
The Jehova Jireh group has three members, all trustworthy. The group is located in the Eben Ezer neighborhood of the city of Danli. Here´s a description of the members´ businesses: Sr. Manuel de Jesus R. C. operates a business making and selling sweets. The business is called Dulces R.--nice play on Manuel´s name--and specializes in sweets made with bananas. Manuel has operated the business for four years. His customers come day after day to buy from him and he can´t always meet demand because he doesn´t have enough capital to buy the ingredients he needs for his sweets. His products are popular because they´re delicious--¨R.¨--and priced right. Manuel is married and his wife helps him with the business because demand is so great. The couple has 2 children who also help with the business. Sra. Arsenia A. has operated a business making and selling corn tortillas for more than six years. She operates the business at home. She has won over her customers with big portions and the cleanliness of her kitchen. Her customers are drawn from the Col. Eben Ezer and Col Bella Vista neighborhoods. She makes the tortillas and sells some of them from her house and others from a corner shop. Still others are delivered to regular customers. Arsenia is married. Her husband is also an entrepreneur, traveling around the ¨departamento¨ of El Paraiso, selling a wide range of goods. The couple has three children and they are 100% responsible for providing them with food, schooling, etc. Sra. Gloria Marina F. Ordonez has operated a business making and selling donuts for about a year. Gloria makes the donuts at home and sells them at two tobacco factories that are near her house, the factories´ employees being her target customers. Gloria makes 100 donuts a day. She sells them all but she can´t make more because she doesn´t have the capital to do so. She would like to expand so everyone who wants her delicious donuts can buy them. She tells us that her customers often ask for Osmil or juices but she can´t supply them because she doesn´t have enough money to invest in thermos bottles and ice to provide beverages to her customers. Gloria is the single mother of three children. Her former partner provides her with some support for food but it´s not enough to cover all the household´s expenses. She started the business to cover the difference and it´s gone well so far. She now needs a loan to help her meet the demand from her customers.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

texts.es:
Wellinton tiene 28 años, es un padre de familia muy alegre y trabajador, vive en una casa alquilada junto a su esposa Mariluz de 26 años y su querido hijo de 5 años, quienes son el motivo de todos sus esfuerzos.

Con el apoyo de su esposa, ha logrado que sus chacras se vuelvan muy fértiles y productivas, pues todos los días trabajan juntos haciendo que sus cultivos cada vez sean mejores. Después de la cosecha lleva a vender sus productos hasta el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma, donde generalmente recibe muy buena paga.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cultivas las alverjas, papas y choclos; lleva 10 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos hasta el mercado.
Con el tiempo, espera tener un pequeño puesto de ventas para su esposa en el mercado, ya que cree que pierde mucho al vender sus productos al por mayor.

Este es el séptimo préstamo de Wellinton con MFP, ha sido muy puntual en sus anteriores créditos y espera serlo ahora también. En su banco comunal es un socio muy responsable y siempre está al tanto de los acuerdos a los que llegan en su grupo. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados comprará semillas de alverja y papa, ya que estos son los productos que tienen más demanda.
texts.en:
Wellinton is 28 years old, and is a very hardworking, cheerful father. He lives in a rented house with his 26 year old wife, Mariluz, and their beloved son who is 5 years old and who is the motive for all their efforts.

With the help of his wife, he has worked his land until it is very fertile and productive. Every day they work side by side to ensure that their crops keep improving. After the harvest, they sell their produce in the main market of the city of Tarma, where they generally get good prices.

What he likes most about his work is cultivating his peas, potatoes, and corn. He has been doing this for 10 years and he thinks the most difficult thing about it is transporting his produce to the market.

In time, he hopes to have a small stall at the market where his wife can sell their produce, as he believes they loose much of their potential profit by selling wholesale to other vendors.

This is the seventh loan that Wellinton has had from MFP. He has been very punctual in repaying his earlier loans, and hopes to do the same this time as well. He is a very responsible member of his community bank, and is always aware of the agreements they have reached as a group. With the $725 he is requesting, he will buy pea and potato seeds because those are the crops that are most in demand.

Translated from Spanish by Alison Hynd, Kiva Volunteer

loans.name: Damas Trabajadoras Group

texts.es:
El comité “Damas  Trabajadoras ” se conforma gracias al deseo de sus integrantes  de mejorar su calidad de vida  , la mayoría de sus integrantes  ya  realiza actividades productivas, actividades. 
Una de las integrantes es la señora Josefa R. quien posee un Kiosco(venta de bebidas y alimentos de todo tipo en pequeñas cantidades), ella vende bebidas e general  y ademas alimentos como empanadas de carne ,empanadas de pollo ,empanadas de jamón y queso , y otros. Es una señora muy trabajadora y que sueña salir adelante ya que anhela un futuro mejor para sus hijos es por eso que se esfuerzan el doble para facilitarles un mejor horizonte que el que a ellas les toco vivir.
El crédito fue utilizado para la compra de mercaderías como bebidas en general y también para la compra de ingredientes para la elaboración de alimentos
texts.en:
The “Damas Trabajadoras” (Working Women) Committee was formed thanks to the desire of its members to improve their quality of life. The majority of its members are involved in productive activities.

One of the members is Josefa R., who manages a kiosk where she sells beverages and food of all kinds in small quantities. The food that she sells includes beef empanadas, chicken empanadas, ham and cheese empanadas, and other items. She is a hardworking woman who dreams of moving forward and achieving a better future for her children. For this reason, she works twice as hard to provide that brighter horizon in which they can live. Her loan will be used to buy merchandise such as beverages in general and also ingredients for food preparation.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase beverages & ingredients for food preparation

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en: Stephen is a 52-year-old man, married and blessed with two children.  He is a farmer and a milk vendor.  He has been selling milk for the last three years.  He has one employee to assist him in the business. He is a hardworking man who hopes to improve his living standards.  He dreams of employing more people in the future. He wants to improve his farm for better output.  As a result, he has requested a loan of Kes 50,000 from Faulu Kenya.

loans.use: To improve his farm for better output

texts.es:
El señor Ponciano tiene 62 años , esta casado tiene cinco hijos, y  y varios nietos, que son su razón de vivir. Hoy tiene su propio negocio y gracias a ello ha podido educar a todos sus hijos que hasta hoy en día van a la facultad. 
El negocio es familiar todos se ayudan en la atención de los clientes cuando no están estudiando , hace 16 años que recibe el apoyo de la Fundación Paraguaya y esta muy agradecido por ello.
Su deseo es seguir progresando y que sus hijos puedan lograr tener una educación superior a la que El no alcanzò.
El crédito lo utilizó para surtir de mercaderías su negocio.
texts.en:
Sr. Ponciano is 62 years old and married. He has five children and numerous grandchildren who give him a reason to live. Today he has his own business that enabled him to educate all of his children and allow them to go on to university. His family business is one in which everyone helps attend to the customers when they are not studying. For the past 16 years, Ponciano has received support from Fundación Paraguaya and for this he is very grateful. He hopes to continue progressing and that his children will achieve the college education that he was not able to obtain.

This loan will be used to acquire merchandise for his business.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

David is a 46 year old married man with two children in school.  He was employed in an animal farm before he started operating his retail shop five years ago.  He sells foodstuff, household items,  and clothes.  He is also a contractor who hopes to start his own construction firm in the future.  Being the breadwinner, he has to work hard to meet his family’s needs so he has requested a loan of Kes.40,000 from Faulu Kenya to add to his shop's inventory and increase his income.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

texts.en: Jeremiah, who is married, is a confident and determined man.  He has been selling cattle for four years. He buys cattle and resells them to local dairy farmers. He also grows vegetables for sale. Jeremiah hopes to grow his business and improve his standard of  living in the future and has requested a loan of kes.20,000 from Faulu Kenya to buy cattle.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
La Sra. Celia  tiene  47  años, está casado con Emigdio Gonzalez ,ellos tienen dos hijos mayores .
Celia tiene servicios de vajilleria en su domicilio ,ella heredo este negocio de sus padres ,gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación logro ampliar su negocio y mantener su clientela formada ;mientras que  el Sr. Emigdio trabaja como chófer particular  de una familia .
El crédito será de gran  ayuda para renovar sus mesas y sillas   y así poder cumplir con  un buen servicio . 
 Ellos anhelan poder comprar un vehículo para  poder ofrecer  mas comodidad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Sra. Celia is 47 years old and married to Emigdio Gonzalez. They have two grown children. Celia runs a special events business out of her home. She inherited this business from her parents. Thanks to her efforts and dedication, she was able to expand her business and maintain the clientele she had built. Meanwhile, Sr. Emigdio works for a family as a private chauffeur.

This loan will be of great help in replacing her tables and chairs so that she can provide good service. She hopes to buy a vehicle so that she offer more convenience to her customers.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase chairs, tables, tablecloths, and fabric

texts.en: Lazarus is married with six children. He has run a photography business for 24 years. He also practices farming to increase his earnings. He previously had a retail shop selling used clothes and his wife has a cafeteria. He dreams of putting up his own photo studio and hiring employees to improve his standard of living. He has requested a loan of kes 20,000 from Faulu Kenya to buy photo equipment to make his work faster and more efficient.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

texts.es:
El Sr Cirilo  tiene 47 años, está casado con  la Sra Gregoria Sanchez ,ellos; tienen 5   hijos mayores .
Don Cirilo se dedicó en el rubro de la olería con un tío y aprendió este oficio, y con un poco de capital logro abrir su propio negocio .
El crédito será de gran  ayuda para la compra de mercaderías  en  cantidad y así abaratar el costo del mismo. 
EL  anhelan poder ampliar su negocio y dar mas trabajo a las personas de su barrio.
texts.en:
Sr. Cirilo is 47 years old and married to Sra. Gregoria Sanchez. They have five grown children. Don Cirilo has been making clay bricks with his uncle, from whom he learned this trade. With a little bit of capital, he was able to open his own business.

This loan will be of great help in purchasing materials in quantity, thereby lowering the cost. He hopes to expand his business and provide more work to people in his neighborhood.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

texts.es:
El Sr .Dionicio tiene 42 años es soltero y tiene 2 hijos  en edad escolar. 
Dionicio tiene un taller mecánico en la cuidad  de San Lorenzo., con una clientela ya formada.
El Sr.  trabajaba en un taller mecánico , luego con mucho sacrificio logro abrir su propio taller. 
El crédito será de ayuda para poder comprar repuestos , cubiertas ya que esta abriendo una gomería , cerca de su taller.
En el futuro desea  ampliar su negocio y dar mas trabajo a la comunidad.
texts.en:
Sr. Dionicio is 42 years old, single, and has two school-age children. He has a vehicle repair shop in the city of San Lorenzo and a clientele that he has already built. Dionicio worked at another garage and later opened his own shop after much sacrifice.

This loan will help him buy spare parts and covers. He has already opened a tire store next to his shop. In the future, he hopes to expand his business and provide more work to the community.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

texts.es:
La señora Karen Yaneth S. vive en la colonia Flor del Campo y se dedica al negocio de produccion y venta de tortillas de maiz, desde los 16 años realiza este tipo de actividad, vende de Lunes a Domingo. Ya tiene clientes fijos de su colonia y otros en colonias cercanas. Empieza desde las 12: 00 Mediodia hasta las 7:00 de la noche, manda a vender a una sobrina y le paga $ 4.00 diarios.
Su esposo el señor Juan Carlos labora para una empresa constructora, tienen cuatro hijos, tres estan estudiando y el ultimo es un bebe de cuatro meses. 
Gracias a su negocio ella puede pasar al cuidado de sus hijos ya que no tiene que salir de su casa, es una mujer muy trabajadora y necesita el credito para la compra de maiz y leña debido a que las ultimas semanas ha tenido problemas para encontrar la leña.
texts.en:
Sra. Karen Yaneth S. lives in the Flor del Campo subdivision and manages her business of making and selling corn tortillas. She has been in this line of work for 16 years and sells her products Monday to Sunday. Karen has regular customers from her neighborhood and others from the surrounding areas. She works from 12pm to 7pm. She also has a niece who she pays $4/day to sell her products. Her husband Juan Carlos works for a construction company. They have four children, three are in school and the youngest one is a four month old baby.

Thanks to her business, she has been able to care for her children without having to leave home. She is a hardworking woman and needs this loan to buy corn and firewood. Within the past few weeks, she has had problems obtaining firewood.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

texts.es:
El Sr. Francisco tiene 28 años , tiene un hijo en edad escolar, esta casado con la Sra. Maura Cuellar hace bastante tiempo ya, viven en su casa propia en la ciudad de San Lorenzo.
Alquila un local en donde tiene su taller de Bordados y confección de gorros y remeras  hace 10 años en la ciudad de San Lorenzo cerca de la Oficina de la Fundación Paraguaya., esta actividad lo heredo de su padre que fue quien le enseño todo acerca de esta actividad luego de fallecer su padre dejo todo bajo su responsabilidad. 
Trabaja para varias empresas grandes a quines realiza sus Bordados y Confecciones.
Es una persona que ha progresado mucho en la vida y agradece a la Fundación Paraguaya por el apoyo que le ha brindado.
Su deseo es seguir progresando y el crédito lo utilizo para la compra de telas.
texts.en:
Sr. Francisco is 28 years old and has a child in school. He has been married to Sra. Maura Cuella for quite some time now. They live in their own home in the city of San Lorenzo.

From a rented space, Francisco operates an embroidery and sewing workshop where he manufactures caps and T-shirts. He started this business ten years ago in the city of San Lorenzo, near the office of Fundación Paraguaya. Francisco learned this trade from his father, who taught him everything related to this activity. After his father passed away, Francisco took over all of his responsibilities. He works for several large companies that produce embroideries and apparel.

Francisco is a person has who has made much progress in life. He thanks Fundación Paraguaya for the support they have provided. He hopes to continue progressing and will use this loan to purchase fabric.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

texts.es:
La Sra. Esther  tiene como actividad la atencion de un salon de fiestas infantiles a demas de la elaboracion de cotillones, canastitas y adornos para fiestas infantiles, cumpleaños y otros.
Esta atividad que realiza es un apoyo al ingreso de su familia, la misma  que esta compuesta por su esposo  Don Fernando y sus tres hijos, de esta manera ayuda al sustento de su familia, el destino del credito es para compra de sillas plasticas para el salon que ella atiende a demas de un equipo de sonido para el mismo ya que esta alquilando un local para fiestas infantiles, Uno de sus deseos es el de ser muy conocida por tener uno de los mejores salones de fiestas infantiles y asi poder tener muchos clientes, es una persona responsable y dinamica, Esta muy agradecida con Emprender y Kiva por la confianza brindada en la otorgacion del credito.
texts.en:
Sra. Esther manages an activity hall for children’s parties. She also makes party favors, baskets, and decorations for children’s parties, birthdays, and other events.

Esther operates her business in order to help with the income to support her family, which consists of her husband Don Fernando and their three children. This loan will be used to buy plastic chairs for her activity hall. She also wants to acquire sound equipment that can be rented out for children’s parties.

One of her wishes is to become known for having one of the best locations for hosting children’s parties so that she can attract more customers. Esther is a responsible and dynamic person. She is very grateful to Emprender and Kiva for their trust by providing this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

texts.es:
Wilker tiene 20 años, es un joven muy alegre y trabajador, vive en la casa que le heredaron sus padres hace 5 años y está dispuesto a trabajar muy duro con tal de mejorar su calidad de vida.

Siendo aun muy joven, sabe que tiene que poner todas sus fuerzas para lograr ganarse la vida con su labor. Él se dedica a la siembra de papa, choclo, zanahoria y alverja, productos que llegada la época de cosecha llevará a vender al mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma, donde sus clientes, conocedores de la calidad de sus cultivos, los compran rápidamente.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus siembras de las plagas; lleva 4 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es llevar sus cultivos hasta el mercado donde los vende, ya que los sacos que lleva son muy pesados. 
Para más adelante, tiene el deseo de comprarse un auto, con el cual pueda transportar él mismo sus productos.

Este es el primer préstamo de Wilker con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar sus cuotas puntualmente si desea acceder a otro crédito posteriormente. En su banco comunal es un socio muy participativo. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados comprará semillas de papa y alverja, además de abono e insecticidas.
texts.en:
Wilker is 20 years of age, and a cheerful hardworking young man. He lives in the house he inherited from his parents five years ago. Wilker is inclined to work hard so that he can improve his quality of life.

When he was much younger, he knew he had to focus all of his efforts to making a life for himself through his work. Wilker grows potatoes, corn, carrots and peas. These crops are approaching the harvest season and he will sell them at the wholesale market in the city of Tarma. His customers are aware of the quality of his crops, so they buy them quickly. What he enjoys most about his job is protecting his crops from pestilence. Wilker has been farming for four years and considers the most difficult part to be hauling his produce to the market where he sells because the sacks of produce are very heavy. Later on, he hopes to buy a car so that he will be able to transport his products.

This is Wilker’s first loan with MFP. He knows that he has to submit his payments on time if he wants to access more loans in the future. Wilker is an active participant in his Communal Bank. With this loan of 1000 PEN, he will buy seeds for planting potatoes and peas, as well as compost and insecticides.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.name: Wilmer

texts.es:
Wilmer tiene 30 años, es un padre de familia muy amoroso y responsable. Vive de manera independiente en la casa de sus padres, junto a su esposa Damiana de 29 años y su querida hija Milagros de 7 años, a quienes desea brindar una mejor vida.

Desde muy joven aprendió de sus padres a trabajar en la chacra, todos los días ayudaba en el trabajo, ya que era consiente que de ello dependía el bienestar de su familia. Actualmente tiene sus propias tierras, las cuales cultiva con muchas ganas, ya que sabe que ahora de está actividad depende el bienestar de su esposa y su hija.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos y se siente muy feliz cuado los ve grandes y abundantes; lleva 18 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es llevar lo cosechado hasta el mercado de la ciudad de Tarma, que es el lugar donde los vende.
Para más adelante, desea comprar nuevas tierras y así incrementar su producción.

Este es el sétimo préstamo de Wilmer con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente y está dispuesto a hacerlo, ya que no desea meter en problemas a su banco comunal, donde es un socio muy solidario y responsable. Con los tres mil nuevos soles solicitados comprará semillas de papa y alverja, ya que estos productos se están vendiendo muy bien estos meses.
texts.en:
Wilmer is 30 years old and a loving responsible father. He lives independently at the home of his parents with his wife Damiana (age 29) and their beloved daughter Milagros (age 7). They hope to provide her a better life.

From a young age, Wilmer learned from his parents how to work on a farm. Every day he helped them with their work since he was conscious that his family’s welfare depended on it. He currently has his own land that he has cultivated with great success since now the welfare of his wife and daughter depend on his work. What he enjoys most about his job is looking after his crops and feeling extremely happy when his harvests are large and abundant. Wilmer has been farming for 18 years and considers the most difficult part to be hauling his produce to the market in the city of Tarma, the place where he sells them. Later on, he wants to buy additional land so that he can increase his production.

This is his seventh loan with MFP. Wilmer knows he has to submit all of his payments on time and is inclined to do so because he does not want to cause problems for his Communal Bank. He is a very supportive and responsible member. With his loan of 3000 PEN, Wilmer will buy seeds for planting potatoes and peas since these products have been selling well in recent months.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase seeds for planting potatoes & peas

loans.name: Rosa Adilia

texts.es: La Joven Rosa Adilia de 21 años de edad es soltera, vive en el municipio del Coral Chontales,  trabaja en la Alcaldia como Colector de Impuestos  desde hace un año, a pesar que esta clienta no tiene hijos ayuda a sus hermanos menores de 12 y 15 años con los gastos de sus estudios, ya que son de escasos recursos económicos,  está solicitando financiamiento de su primer  credito con el cual pretende comprar materiales de construcciòn para construir una cocina ya que le hace falta dinero para iniciar la obra  y asi tener mejores condiciones en su casa para su familia, actualmente esta estudiando una licenciatura en la Universidad  Martin Lutero,  su sueño es  llegar a ser una profesional para ayudar a su familia y tener estabilidad laboral.
texts.en:
Rosa Adilia is a single young woman who is 21 years of age. She lives in the town of Coral Chontales and has been working as a municipal tax collector for one year. Although she does not have children, Rosa helps her younger siblings (ages 12 and 15) with their educational expenses because her family has limited resources.

The loan she is requesting will be her first one and go toward the purchase of construction materials for building a kitchen. Rosa does not have the money to start the work, but she wants to provide better conditions at home for her family. She is currently studying to earn a degree from Martin Luther University. Her dream is to become a professional so that she can help her family and achieve job stability.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase construction materials for building a kitchen

texts.es: Teresa de 46 años de edad vive en la zona # 6 de Nueva Guinea, labora para el MINED Nueva Guinea como docente desde hace 10 años, es madre soltera de tres hijos mayores de edad los cuales tienen su propia familia y viven en sus propias casas , esta solicitando su primer crèdito para comprar materiales  para lograr construir un baño de concreto el cual le vendria a mejorar sus condiciones,  actualmente esta estudiando su cuarto año en la Universidad Uraccan, doña Teresa se caracteriza por ser muy responsable, honesta y con mucho deseos de superaciòn personal y profesional,  su sueño es tener trabajo digno y salud.
texts.en:
Teresa is 46 years old. She lives in Zone # 6 of Nueva Guinea. She has worked for the MINED Nueva Guinea as a teacher for 10 years. She is a single mother of three grown children who have their own families and live in their own homes. She is asking for her first loan to buy material to build a concrete bathroom which will improve her living conditions. Right now she is in her fourth year at the Universidad Uraccan. Teresa is very responsible and honest and really wants to get ahead personally and professionally. Her dream is to have a good job and good health.

Translated from Spanish by Ellen Donohue, Kiva Volunteer

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
El Sr. Julio  tiene 37 años y esta casado con la Sra. Elida con quien tienen dos hijos en edad escolar secundario. El Sr. A. tiene un terreno grande donde tiene plantación de horticultura por una parte y por otra parte tienen vacas lecheras y también el mismo se encarga de ordeñar y cuidar de los dos trabajos, en la casa tienen una Despensa donde se quedan a atender la señora con sus hijos.
La Despensa tienen bien surtida porque tiene muchos cliente del barrios y también  vienen de otros. El crédito que están solicitando es para la compras de mercaderías que mas venta tiene como; panificados, embutidos, lácteos, carnes, gaseosas, cervezas.
texts.en:
Julio is 37 years old. He is married to Elida with whom he has two high school age children. Mr. A. has a large plot of land where he a horticulture plantation on one part and dairy cows and the other. He does the milking and does both jobs. In his house he also has a store which his wife runs with their children. The store has a good variety of products since he has a lot of customers from the neighborhood and some come from others. The loan he is asking for is to purchase the best selling merchandise such as: baked goods, cold cuts, meat, soda and beer.

Translated from Spanish by Ellen Donohue, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase merchandise such as baked goods, cold cuts, meat, soda and beer

texts.es: Oscar Antonio de 33 años de edad es casado, tiene 3 niños estudiando educaciòn primaria, trabaja para el MINED Nueva Guinea desde hace 10 años  en la colonia Caracito,  esta solicitando su 5to credito para mejorar su vivienda, pues desea construir una habitaciòn para asì brindarle mayor comodidad y privacidad a su familia y contar con mejores condiciones en el hogar. Actualmente està estudiando una Licenciatura en ciencias de la Educaciòn en la Universidad URACCAN para mejorar sus conocimientos e impartirlos a sus alumnos,  es un docente con muchos deseos de superaciòn profesional y laboral, se caracteriza por ser responsable, honesto y de buenas costumbres.
texts.en:
Oscar Antonio, 33, is married and has three children, who are in elementary school. He has worked for MINED (Ministry of Education) in Nueva Guinea for 10 years in the Caracito neighborhood. He is asking for his 5th loan to make home improvements because he'd like to build a bedroom so that his family can have greater comfort and privacy as well as better living conditions in the home. He is currently completing his bachelor's degree in education at URACCAN (Universidad de las Regiones Autónomas de la Costa Caribe Nicaragüense) so that he can improve his command of the subject matter and be a better teacher. He is a teacher who wants to improve both professionally and personally. He is responsible, honest and of good habits.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.name: María Nieves

texts.es:
La señora  María N. tiene  37 años de edad, vive  en unión libre con su pareja que trabaja como maestro de construcción y sus seis hijos, el mayor tiene 16 años y trabaja como ayudante junto a su padre,  además estudia a distancia para terminar sus estudios secundarios que los dejo porque no le gustaba estudiar y ahora los ha retomado,  sus otros cinco hijos oscilan entre 14 y 4 años todos estudiantes excepto el pequeño que pasa junto a ella, viven en una casa arrendada en el barrio Trinidad  en la parroquia Turi, esta parroquia se caracteriza por tener una gran afluencia de turistas ya que de allí se puede observar una gran parte de la ciudad de Cuenca, la  mayor parte de su población  se dedica a la agricultura y los mas jóvenes trabajan en la ciudad.

 Maria se dedica al arreglo de casas ajenas  labor que realiza varios años solo medio tiempo cuatro días a la semana el resto de tiempo lo dedica a su familia, a la agricultura siembra  hortalizas y también a la cría de pollos lo que  vende en el mercado de la feria libre en la ciudad de Cuenca. 

Se encuentra en su segundo ciclo y los créditos le han ayudado para continuar con su  criadero de pollos y comprar el alimento para su crianza,  con el nuevo crédito que la FUNDACIÓN ESPOIR  le entregue va a comprar  pollos, maíz, vitaminas para incrementar su negocio.

Como le gusta todo lo que se trata de cocina  su sueño es tener un pequeño puesto de comidas para deleitar con su rica gastronomía a sus clientes.
texts.en:
María N., 37, lives with her life partner, who works in construction, and their 6 children. The oldest is 16 years old and works as a helper with his father; he is also finishing secondary school because he had dropped out of school but is now back attempting to finish his studies (he is in an open studies program). The other five children are between 14 and 4 years of age; they are all students except the youngest, who stays home with his mother. They live in a rented house in the Trinidad neighborhood, Turi parish. This parish is known for being a tourist attraction because one can get a panoramic view of most of Cuenca from there. Most of the residents are farmers and the young residents work in the city. Maria works as a domestic caring for other people’s houses. She has been in this line of work for several years but she only works part-time, four days a week; the rest of the time she spends with her family, she farms vegetables and she raises chickens for subsequent sale in Cuenca’s free market. This is her second loan cycle. Previous loans have made it possible for her to maintain her chicken hatchery and to buy feed for her chicks. The new loan from FUNDACIÓN ESPOIR will be used to buy chickens, corn and vitamins to enlarge her business. Because she enjoys everything that has to do with cooking, her hope for the future is to have a small food stand to sell her delicious dishes.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy chickens, corn and vitamins.

texts.es: Julia de 53 años de edad es madre soltera de 2 hijas mayores de edad, trabaja como docente en la Escuela Cèsar Augusto Salinas Pinell de Nueva Guinea desde hace 32 años, se caraceteriza por ser una mujer responsable honesta y muy trabajadora, su hija mayor vive con ella, y como se encuentra desempleada le ayuda hacer los quehaceres del hogar,  con este prestamo pretende construir una habitaciòn, para tener mejor comodidad en el hogar y privacidad ya que solamente tiene una habitaciòn en la casa, el sueño es poco a poco ir mejorando su vivienda con los crèditos y ayudar a su familia en lo que mas pueda ya que son de escasos recursos econòmicos.
texts.en:
Julia is a 53 years old single mother of two adult daughters. She has worked as a teacher in the Cesar Augusto Salinas Pinell de Nueva Guinea School for 32 years. She is known as a responsible and very hardworking woman. Her older daughter lives with her because she finds herself unemployed, and her daughter helps her with housework. With this loan she intends to construct a room that will improve the comfort and privacy in her home. The house only has one room right now. The dream is to improve her house little by little with her credit and help her family as much as possible with the little economic resources she has.

Translated from Spanish by Caitlin Brooks, Kiva Volunteer

loans.name: Mario Alberto

texts.es:
El Señor Mario tiene 32 años,está casada con la señora Teresa Noemi Gutierrez Martinez y tienen un hijo menor de edad. Ellos tienen una cerrajería donde realizan copias de llaves, cerraduras, también prestan servicios de reparaciones e instalaciones a domicilio. 
En paralelo a esta actividad realizan venta de carne, queso, golosinas y todo tipo de embutidos a varios negocios de la zona y por otras ciudades del área metropolitana. Se dedican a estas actividades desde el año 2003. 
Este crédito será de mucha utilidad para el matrimonio, pues están realizando la construcción de un pequeño salón comercial en su domicilio, de esa forma podrán brindar mayor comodidad a sus clientes y con el tiempo aumentar el stock de mercaderías para la venta, con este proyecto esperan poder generar mejores ingresos para su familia y podrán cumplir lentamente su anhelo de terminar la construcción de su casa.
texts.en:
Sergio Mario, 32, is married to Teresa Noemi Gutierrez Martinez; they have a son. They have a locksmith shop where they make keys and locks. They also provide home lock installation and repair services. Alonside this business, they also sell meat, cheese, snacks and cured meats to various businesses in the area and in other cities in the metropolitan area. They have been in this business since 2003. This loan will be very useful to the couple because they are building a small events hall in their home so that they can offer their customers more comfort and increase their stock of available items for sale. They hope to generate higher income for their family with this project so that they can gradually reach their goal of building their home.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To finish building an events facility in his home.

loans.name: Melvin Antonio

texts.es: Don Melvin de 26 años de edad es Soltero, trabaja como docente de educaciòn secundaria desde hace 8 años en la escuela Rafaela Herrera de Nueva Guinea. Està solicitando su 4to crèdito y espera seguir siendo beneficiado por el fondo kiva, ya que con el anterior logro satisfactoriamente  construir una habitaciòn, con este  nuevo crèdito pretende  repellar y hecharle el piso a  la habitaciòn y asì tener mejor comodidad en el hogar. Melvin actualmente se encuentra estudiando su 5to año de la carrera Ciencias de Educaciòn, pues desea poseer mayores conocimientos para impartirlos a sus alumnos, es un joven muy responsable ya que asume los gastos familiares del hogar y los compromisos  adquiridos ya que son  una familia bien unida.
texts.en:
Melvin, 26, is single and has been employed as a secondary school teacher for 8 years at Nueva Guinea's Rafaela Herrera school. He is asking for his 4th loan and hopes to continue to be favored by Kiva because his previous loan made it possible for him to build a room. He intends to use these new funds to seal the walls and lay a floor to increase his home's comfort level. Melvin is in his 5th year of studies toward his bachelor's degree in Education. He wants to learn more so that he can be a better teacher. He is a responsible young man in that he has taken on the responsibility for his family's household expenses and other family obligations because they are a very unified family.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To seal the walls and install flooring in the bedroom.

texts.es: Doña Irma Rosa de 50 años de edad es soltera, vive junto a su compañero de vida,  tiene 4 hijos mayores el mayor de 32, otro de 31, otro de 29 y el menor de 28 años de edad, todos ya casados y con su propia familia, dos trabajan como docente de primaria y llos otro dos como albañiles. Irma Rosa trabaja como Tecnica Agropecuaria desde hace 13 años, atendiendo a campesinos del municipio,  està solicitando refinanciamiento de su 4to  credito con el cual pretende terminar de construir una habitaciòn, para asì tener mejor comodidad en el hogar ya que son una familia de escasos recursos econòmicos,  su sueño es  ir poco a poco mejorando su vivienda y estar bien con Dios, quien nos tiene vivos y con animos de seguir trabajando y alabandole.
texts.en:
Irma Rosa, aged 50, is single and liveswith her life partner. She has four grown children, aged 32, 31, 29 and 28. All are married with their own family. Two work as primary school teachers and the other two as brick masons. Irma Rosa has worked as an agricultural technician for 13 years, helping farmers in her town. She is seeking her fourth loan with AFODENIC to finish construction on a bedroom. This will provide a more comfortable home, as they are a family of limited resources. Her dream is to continue improving her house little by little, and to be right with God, who keeps us alive, and to continue working and praising Him.

Translated from Spanish by jeffrey hersk, Kiva Volunteer

texts.es:
EL SR. GERSON VIVE EN LA LOCALIDAD DE LA GUARDIA DISTANTE 20 KM. DE LA CIUDAD DE SANTA CRUZ , DONDE VIVE EN UNA CASA EN ANTICRETICO, ESTA CASADO Y TIENE DOS HIJOS PEQUEÑOS, COMO ACTIVIDAD PRINCIPAL EL SE DEDICA AL SERVICIO DE TRANSPORTE DE PERSONAS Y COMO SEGUNDA ACTIVIDAD A LA CONSTRUCCION; YA QUE EL NEGOCIO DEL TRANSPORTE NO ES ESTABLE.
 
SU ESPOSA LA SRA. MAGDALENA, SE DEDICA A CUIDAR DE SUS HIJOS, POR LO QUE EL TIENE QUE TRABAJAR DESDE MUY TEMPRANO HASTA LARGAS HORAS DE LA NOCHE PARA LLEVAR EL SUSTENTO DIARIO A SU FAMILIA. EL ES UNA PERSONA RESPONSABLE, DINAMICA Y MUY TRABAJADORA QUE TIENE QUE TRABAJAR DURO PARA MEJORAR LA CALIDAD DE VIDA DE TODA SU FAMILIA, EL DINERO DEL CREDITO LO UTILIZARA EN LA REPARACION Y MANTENIMIENTO DE SU VEHICULO Y ASI PODER BRINDAR MEJOR SERVICIO A SUS CLIENTES. ESTA MUY AGRADECIDA CON EMPRENDER Y KIVA POR LA CONFIANZA BRINDADA EN LA OTORGACION DEL CREDITO.  

SI QUIERES SABER MAS DE LA PROVINCIA EL TORNO  LA GUARDIA VISITA LA PAGINA http://www.ocasha-ccs.org/Proyecto/Eltorno.htm
texts.en:
Sr. Gerson lives in the town of La Guardia, which is 20km from the city of Santa Cruz. He lives in a house through an “anticretico” arrangement (in which the property owner pawns the house to the occupant). Gerson is married and has two young children. He works in the transportation sector, but also has a second job in construction since his transport business is not stable. His wife Sra. Magdalena looks after their children so that he can work in the early hours until late into the night to support their family. Gerson is a responsible, dynamic, and hardworking person who puts in tremendous effort to improve the quality of life for his family. He will use this loan to repair and perform maintenance on his vehicle in order to offer better service to his clients. He is grateful to Emprender and Kiva for their trust by providing this loan. If you would like to learn more about the province of El Torno or La Guardia visit the website: http://www.ocasha-ccs.org/Proyecto/Eltorno.htm

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

texts.es:
La Sra. Marta tiene  45  años, está separada con dos hijos mayores , universitario.
Marta tiene su boutique en la cuidad de San Lorenzo  , ya hace mas de 20 años, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación logro  mantener  una clientela formada. 
El crédito es  para la compra de ropas de invierno  como camperas, poleras, gorras. Medias de lana, busos, pantalones. 
 Ella sueña con tener un local mas amplio y ofrecer mas comodidad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Marta is 45 years old, is separated and has two adult, college student children. Marta has her boutique in the city of San Lorenzo, and, thanks to her effort and dedication in maintaining an established clientele, she has had the store for more than 20 years now. This credit is for buying winter clothes, such as jackets, warm shirts, hats, wool socks, sweaters and pants. She dreams of having a larger store and of offering more comfort and convenience to her customers.

Translated from Spanish by Caitlin Brooks, Kiva Volunteer

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Doña  Elizabeth de 44 años de edad es soltera, vive en la zona # 6 de Nueva Guinea,  trabaja como Conserje  desde hace 5 años, tiene tre hijos mayores de edad de 23,25 y 28 años todos trabajan y tienen su hogar  pero siempre ella vive al pendiente de ellos, está solicitando  refinanciamiento de su nuevo credito con el cual pretende comprar materiales de construcciòn para construir los servicios higienicos de la casa,  y asi tener mejores condiciones , ella es una mujer que se ha caracterizado por ser honesta, trabajadora y de buenas costumbres,  su sueño es  que sus hijos sigan estudiando y estabilidad laboral para ayudar a su familia .
texts.en:
Elizabeth, 44, is single; she lives in Zona #6, Nueva Granada. She has been employed as a caretaker for the last 5 years. She has three adult children who are 23, 25 and 28 years of age. They are all employed and have their own homes but she is always looking out for their wellbeing. She is asking for a new loan to buy building materials in order to build sanitary services (bathroom) in her home so that it will have better conditions. She is a woman who is known for being honest, hard-working and of good habits. Her dream is that her children continue to study and that she have stable work so that she can continue to help her family.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies.

texts.es:
La Sra. Naida tiene 25 años es soltera  y vive en la casa de sus padres en San Lorenzo, no tiene hijos.
La Sra. Naida se dedica a la venta de perfumes y ropas hace 5 años, sus ventas lo realiza en distintas ciudades, también es docente hace 4 años donde enseña en una escuela cerca de su casa..
Este crédito es para la compra de mayor cantidad a menor costo de las mercaderías que ella vende..
Es una persona que ha progresado mucho en la vida y agradece a la Fundación Paraguaya por el apoyo que le ha brindado.
texts.en:
Naida, 25, is single and lives with her parents in San Lorenzo; she doesn't have any children. Naida has sold perfume and clothing for the last 5 years. She sells in various cities and, for the last 4 years, she has been a teacher in a school near her house. This loan will be used to buy a larger quantity of the products she sells at lower cost. She is a person who has made a lot of progress in her life and is grateful to Fundación Paraguaya for the support it has given her.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.name: Jose Balbino

texts.es:
el señor Jose Balbino R. tiene 34 años de edad, esta casado con la señora Denia Elizabeth Colindres quien se dedica al cuidado de sus 6 hijos, tambien le ayuda en el taller de ladrillos.
 
Balbino atiende el taller, se dedica a la elaboracion de tejas, ladrillos, el transporta la materia prima en un carrito que el tiene. 
El producto lo elabora con tierra y barro, tiene dos operarios que le ayudan a fabricar los ladrillos esta actividad la realiza desde hace 7 años. 
 
esta solicitando el credito para la compra de materia prima como ser tierra, leña y barro.
texts.en:
Jose Balbino R., 34, is married to Denia Elizabeth Colindres, who cares for their 6 children; she also helps him in his brick-making workshop. Balbino tends to the workshop where he makes bricks and roofing tiles; he transports his raw materials in a small truck he has. He makes his products with dirt and clay with the help of two employees; he has been in this business for 7 years. The loan will be used to buy raw materials like: dirt, clay and firewood.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy firewood, dirt and clay.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

texts.es: Ariana de 29 años de edad es casada, trabaja como docente de primaria desde hace 9 años  en la Escuela Alfonso Cortès de Nueva Guinea, vive con sus esposo y sus dos hijos en su casa que tanto le ha costado obtenerla, su niño mayor tiene 4 años y el bebe de 4 meses de nacido, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura y del cuido de las vaquitas que ellos tienen. Ariana está solicitando su 6to crèdito para invertirlo en mejora de su vivienda, como es cambiarle el zinc  ya que se encuenra en mal estado y ponerle perlines, ya que se acerca el invierno y desea evitar que se le mojen sus cosas y  asi poder brindar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia. Ella se caracteriza por ser una mujer muy responsable, honesta, trabajadora y muy querida por sus compañeros de trabajo y padres de familia de sus alumnos. Ella se siente agradecida con la Institución de AFODENIC ya que con los créditos anteriores ha mejorado la vivienda donde ella vive, su sueño es  tener salud y estabilidad laboral y que sus hijos crezcan sanos y fuertes.
texts.en:
Ariana, 29, is married and has been an elementary school teacher for 9 years at Nueva Guinea's Alfonso Cortès school. She lives with her husband and two children in their home, which they have struggled mightily to get. Her oldest son is 4 years old and the baby is 4 months old; her husband is a farmer and cares for a few young cows they own. Ariana is asking for her 6th loan to make home improvements, specifically to replace the zinc metal roofing that is in poor condition and to install metal gutters because Winter is approaching and she doesn't want her things to get wet and she wants to provide her family with better living conditions. She is a responsible, honest, hard-working woman who is held in high regard by her co-workers and the parents of her students. She is grateful to AFODENIC because her previous loans have made it possible for her to improve her home. Her dream is to stay healthy and to have steady employment and that her children grow up to be strong and healthy.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

The Alaxpacha Communal Association belongs to the Germán Busch Focal Centre, located on the outskirts of the city of El Alto. The members of the association are taking out a loan to support their businesses. The majority make and sell artisanal products, such as sweaters, hats and shawls.

One of the members is Paulina A., a widow who lives nearby in the Huayna Potosí district, named after the high mountain that overlooks the neighborhood. She has worked for two years selling artisanal products in the markets of El Alto, which are in a different place each day of the week. The biggest markets are those in the Plaza 16 de Julio every Thursday and Sunday.

Upon receiving their loan, the women bless the money in accordance with the local tradition (this is called ch´alla), so that it will grow and prosper. Please support this loan so that the women of Alaxpacha may grow their businesses.

loans.name: Aris

texts.es: Aris de 26 años de edad, es casado  labora como docente de la Escuela Francisco Aaron Joce de Nueva Guinea desde hace 5 años, su esposa tambien labora como docente de primaria, ambos comparten los gastos familiares, a pesar que no tienen hijos ellos ayudan a su familares cuando lo necesitan , esta solicitando su 3er crèdito  para comprar materiales de construcciòn  ya que le hacen falta  para poder iniciar a construir su propia casa para brindarle mayor comodidad a su familia y vivir en su propio hogar, el se  caracteriza por ser muy responsable, honesto y con mucho deseos de superaciòn personal y profesional,  el sueño  es tener trabajo y  seguir profesionalizandose para que sea un hombre de bien y que sea util a la sociedad.
texts.en:
Aris, 26, is married and has been employed as a teacher in Nueva Guinea's Francisco Aaron Joce school for 5 years; his wife is also an elementary school teacher. Together they share family expenses. Even though they have no children, they help their relatives when they need help. He is asking for his 3rd loan to buy building materials because he needs them to start building his own house so that he can provide better comfort for his family and live in a house of his own. He is noted for being very responsible, honest and with a strong desire to improve both personally and professionally. His dream is to have steady employment and to continue to train in his profession so that he can be an upstanding citizen who is useful to society.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies.

texts.es: Manuel Antonio de 33 años de edad es soltero, trabaja como docente desde hace 13 años para el Ministerio de Educaciòn en la Escuela Cesar Augusto Salinas Pinell impartiendo clases a jovenes de la secundaria, tiene un bebe de 18 meses de edad,  su compañera de vida  se encarga de los quehaceres del hogar  y del cuido del bebe,   está solicitando su quinto crèdito para invertirlo en compra de materiales para repellar y arenillar dos paredes de la casa ya que esta mejoras le darà mas valor a su casa y mas bonita,  actualmente està estudiando un curso de de ingles en la Universidad URACCAN ya que es un hombre con grandes aspiraciones de superaciòn profesonal y laboral . El se siente agradecido con la Institución de AFODENIC ya que con los créditos anteriores ha mejorado sus condiciones de vida y de su linda familia, su sueño es  tener salud y estabilidad laboral.
texts.en:
Manuel Antonio, 33, is single and has been employed by the Ministry of Education as a teacher at Cesar Augusto Salinas Pinell secondary school for 13 years. He has an 18-month-old baby. His life partner does the household chores and cares for their baby. He is asking for his 5th loan to buy building materials and supplies in order to seal and plaster two walls in his house so that his home's value will increase and it will be more attractive. He is currently studying English at URACCAN (Universidad de las Regiones Autónomas de la Costa Caribe Nicaragüense) because he is a man with a strong desire to improve both professionally and personally. He is grateful to AFODENIC because all his previous loans have made it possible for him to improve his own and his lovely family's living condiditons. His dream is to be healthy and to have stable employment.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

texts.es:
Nancy tiene 41 años, años atrás se separó del padre de sus 3 hijos, actualmente tiene una nueva pareja, con quien vive, al lado de sus pequeños en la casa que le dieron a él a cuidar.

En años anteriores era comerciante ambulante, vendía refrescos y golosinas por las calles de su localidad. Pero desde hace 5 años se compró un móvil para elaborar comida rápida (papas fritas salchichas y hamburguesas), colocándose en la puerta de la casa de su madre. Nancy trabaja desde las 7 de la noche hasta la 1 de la madrugada, y le está yendo bien en su negocio, ya que se siente satisfecha y comprometida por los buenos resultados obtenidos. Sus planes a futuro son de instalar una fuente de soda en la casa de su madre, con la finalidad de poder diversificar sus productos y por ende darles mayores opciones a sus clientes, ya que en la misma cuadra hay un gimnasio y muchas personas transitan por allí.

Este es su séptimo préstamo con MFP, por lo que se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas en las fechas establecidas. Con el dinero que solicita obtendrá insumos e ingredientes para la elaboración de sus platillos y por ende atender la demanda de sus comensales.
texts.en:
Nancy is 41 years old. Years ago she separated from the father of her 3 children. She actually has a new partner with whom she lives, together with her 3 little ones, in a house that he was given to look after. In previous years Nancy was a door to door businesswoman who sold soft drinks and lollies in the streets in her area. 5 years ago she bought a stand to make fast food (fries, sausages and hamburgers), situating herself in the doorway of her mother's house. Nancy works from 7pm until 1 in the morning, and her business is going well. She feels very satified and engaged because of the good results she has obtained. Her future plans are to install a soda fountain in her mother's house, with the intention of diversifying her products to give better options to her customers, as there is a gym in the same block as the hosue and many people pass by. This is her seventh loan with MFP. She promises to meet the payments within the established time frame. With the money she is seeking she will obtain consumables and ingredients to make her dishes to meet the demand of her companions at the table.

Translated from Spanish by Jane McCrory, Kiva Volunteer

texts.es: Mauda Yanery  de 37 años de edad es soltera,  trabaja como docente de primaria del Colegio San Juan Bautista de la Salle de Nueva Guinea desde hace 17 años, tiene dos hijos, el mayor Francisco Narvaez de 16 años estudia su quinto año de secundaria y la menor Keylin Narvaez de 14 años  de edad  estudia tercer año de secundaria, està solicitando su 7mo crèdito con el cual pretende construir una habitaciòn para su hijo mayor para que tenga privacidad y esto le ayudara a tener mejores condiciones, espera seguir siendo beneficiada por AFODENIC ya que es una instituciòn con interes bien bajo.  la profesora Mauda es una mujer bien humilde, servicial y  bien responsable.
texts.en:
Mauda Yanery, 37, is single and has worked teaching at the primary school Colegio San Juan Bautista de la Salle de Nueva Guinea for 17 years. She has 2 children, the oldest Francisco Narvaez is 16 and is in his fifth year of secondary school, and the younger, Keylin Narvaez, 14, studies in the third year of secondary school. She is seeking her 7th loan, which she will use to construct a room for her oldest son so that he has privacy and better conditions. She hopes to continue to be favoured by AFODENIC as it is an institution with very low interest rates. Teacher Mauda is a very humble woman, obliging and very responsible.

Translated from Spanish by Jane McCrory, Kiva Volunteer

texts.es:
Con el dinero que solicita obtendrá insumos e ingredientes para la elaboración de sus platillos y por ende atender la demanda de sus comensales.

La actividad que realiza es el tejido a crochet de adornos para chompas, por los que le pagan entre 2 y 3 soles cada uno, estas chompas son exportadas a otros países.
Ella es una persona muy amable y trabajadora, hace 20 años que se dedica a esta actividad, a la cual le tomó mucho cariño, pues le brinda las ganancias económicas para solventar los gastos de su hogar. Para el futuro quiere asociarse con su nuera para tejer sus propias chompas y agregarles los adornos que hace a crochet, así tendrían la posibilidad de exportar sus prendas y ganar mayor cantidad de dinero, pero por el momento están ahorrando el capital suficiente para poner en marcha ese negocio.

Este es su tercer crédito con MFP, por lo que se siente muy comprometido de seguir apostando por invertir en su negocio, ya que le permite mejorar su calidad de vida. Con el dinero que ahora solicita adquirirá lanas diversas y las telas que necesita como soporte de su tejido a crochet. Su idea es ir comprando lanas para implementar su futuro taller de chompas.
texts.en:
Alejandra crochets adornments for jumpers, and is paid between 2 - 3 soles for each adornment. These jumpers are exported to other countries. Alejandra is a very friendly and hard-working person. For 20 years she has worked at this activity, and takes great care doing it, as it gives her the economic earnings to meet her household costs. In the future she wants to start business with her daughter-in-law, to knit their own jumpers and add the adornments to them. In this way they will have the possibility to export their wares and earn better money, but for the moment they are saving sufficient capital to get the business going. This is Alejandra's third loan with MFP, and she feels very excited about continiung to invest in her business, as it gives her a better quality of life. With the money she is seeking she will acquire diverse wool and the threads she needs to crochet. Her idea is to buy wool to implement her future jumper workshop.

Translated from Spanish by Jane McCrory, Kiva Volunteer

texts.es: Maria Teresa de 42 años de edad es soltera  tiene una una hija mayor de edad de 24 años de edad la cual es casada y tiene 2 niños. Maria Teresa  trabaja en INATEC desde hace 17 años en el area de la bibilioteca,  a pesar que solamente tuvo solamente una hija ella ha criado a  tres sobrinos con la ayuda de su mamà ya que ella trabaja en la colonia Yolaina, todos los dìas tiene que viajar a las 7:00 a.m. y regresa a las  6:00 p.m., ella es una mujer responsable honesta y muy trabajadora.
